description:
Great investment property
* Lounge room with solid fuel heater
* Kitchen with electric stove and dishwasher
* Three good sized bedrooms all with built in robes
* Family bathroom with bath, vanity and shower
* Gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout home
* Large secure shed and garden shed in back yard
* Currently tenanted at $270 per week giving an 8.8% gross return on investment .

SIMPLE - IMMACULATE - CLOSE TO RIVER
This beautifully presented three bedroom residence is sited on smaller, easy to manage 641² block in a unique location bordering the state forest and only a short walk to the banks of the Murray River. This modern house features spacious tiled open living area with lots of natural light and lovely bushland outlook. Well appointed kitchen with wall oven, walk in pantry and generous breakfast bar. Has second living area, main bedroom with WIR & ensuite and full size bathroom with spa bath. Climate is controlled by ducted gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling throughout and direct house access from double lockup garage. Lovely low maintenance surrounds, outdoor entertaining area and two garden sheds. Buy and enjoy, nothing to spend.

Great property
This two bedroom home is conveniently located close to the Anglican College, and offers a good amount of front and rear yard. The home itself offers open plan living with the kitchen having a good amount of cupboard space. Both bedrooms are good sizes with built in robes. Climate throughout is controlled by split system. Externally there is a single garage with direct access into the house.

All Of The Boxes Are Ticked In This Beauty...
If you are searching for a modern family home in a quiet location, your search is over. Some of the features include:
* Four generous bedrooms + spacious study
* Master bedroom with en suite & walk in robe
* Formal dining & formal lounge as well as separate family room
* Generous kitchen, dinning & family room opening onto rumpus room/kids retreat
* Large undercover alfresco area with built in wood heater
* 3.5Kw Solar system with 9 panels for added energy efficiency
* Double car garage with rear yard access to 6x8m double bay shed, perfect for all the boys toys
* Generous yard ideal for the kids to play and grow up in
* Call Drew Cameron - 0427 225 980 for your very own private viewing of this magnificent property

Solid home
This solid three bedroom brick veneer home offers generous sized lounge with reverse cycle split system, separate dining area and kitchen with electric wall oven and cooktop. All three bedrooms are large in size and have built in robes. The bathroom has shower, bath and vanity. Offering plenty of storage throughout, there is also a separate laundry and toilet. Externally there is a single carport and front patio area. This home sits proudly elevated on a 893sqm block and will ideally suit someone who wants a fantastic investment to add to their portfolio or someone who is ready to put their own personal touches to this little beauty. Currently tenanted at $280 per week.

Modern 4 bedroom home located in a beautiful court surrounded by quality homes

Open living plan with kitchen, dining, family room and lounge
Comfort assured year round with ducted gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling
Double lock-up garage with good side access to excellent shedding

Spacious & Special
Modern design with exceptional open living plan which has all north facing windows

address: Lot 1 Corner Campbell & Murray Valley Highway Cobram VIC 3644
description:
Rural Setting
Positioned on the outskirts of Cobram this 3.210 HA (7.93 acres)of land has been in the same family for many many years
The property currently has excellent colour bond shedding approx. 17x10 with concrete flooring and power
There's good quality bore water plus town water, and stock & domestic supply
Idea home site with untapped potential
For more information please do not hesitate to call on 5872 1255 7 days

Townhouse - River End
Fantastic town house positioned in a highly sought after location. Low maintenance and ready to move into. This home is perfect for the first home buyer, retiree or investor.
With a good sized kitchen and open living area with sliding doors opening out to undercover outdoor area. The kitchen is fitted with an electric wall oven, gas cook top, dishwasher, double stainless steel sink and breakfast bar. The kitchen provides ample cupboard and bench space, fridge, microwave and bin provision. Evaporative cooling throughout and a gas wall heater in the living area
Three good sized bedrooms all with built-in-robes and ceiling fans; main with ensuite and bay window. Full sized bathroom with shower recess, bath and vanity with plenty of storage underneath.
Moving outdoors this low maintenance home has electric security shutters, covered outdoor area, veggie patch, solar panels and 3x2m garden shed. The rear of the home is fully fenced; double lock up garage with direct house access.
Fantastic home for first home buyers, retiree or investor. Enquire today to book your inspection!

Prime new home site with northerly aspect.

This is the perfect block to build your dream home.

Unique building block in a fantastic location within the town boundary bordering the state forest and only a short distance to the Murray River.
Measuring 1483 square metres with 21.35m frontage to the State Forest & levy bank. Town water and power available. Ideally located with a lovely outlook, only a short walk to the Murray River.
This block is one of a kind - the perfect block to build your dream home and enjoy in-town rural living.

Ideal renovators delight

43 Acres Outstanding Lifestyle Property
Looking for a lifestyle property with income potential? This property comes with many improvements and could be the one! Choice Cobram East location, undulating sandy loam country, in close proximity to the Murray River, features this quality built five bedroom family residence with all the modern comforts.
Large country style kitchen/ living area and formal lounge with feature fire surround. Second living area and a great sized rumpus/ games room with built-in bar. The impressive outdoor entertaining area with pitched rood is fully enclosed with a ceiling fan, kitchenette, door leading to the double garage and opens onto the enclosed yard and in-ground pool.
Other improvements include a spacious fully self-contained bungalow also boasting a lovely outlook over the country side and is ideal for extended family or rental income. The excellent shedding is perfect for a tradesman or ideally suited to run a business from. They include 7m x 14m colorbond shed with an office and toilet facilities, plus an expansive 14m x 24m workshop with an office block, cooling, toilet, wash-bay and truck access.
This property has a domestic bore, an automatic sprinkler system and well-established surrounds.
A highly sought-after location, positioned only a short stroll to the Murray River and priced well below replacement cost.

Hidden Gem!

Externally the pergola area is a great way to enjoy the great outdoors with family and friends. A single lock up garage along with storage sheds just complete this amazing package. Situated in a great area close to the town shopping centre and amenities this beauty is worth a look.

The home offers a separate lounge, generous bedrooms all with built-in-robes, and a renovated bathroom. Throughout the home is ducted gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling; lock up garage under roofline. Secure well fenced yard with a brick lock up shed.
A good solid home, only needing a cosmetic tweak, and a great opportunity for a first home buyer/ investor. Enquire today!
